node.excerpt: A  Button  can display either text or an icon. It can be tapped and will run an  onTap  callback when tapped. It may optionally be toggled with each tap. Props Prop Type Default Notes text string "Get Started!â€ icon string â€none" See  Icon  belowâ€¦
